question: Would you rather have the ability to fly or be invisible?
Would you rather time travel to the past or the future?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late or always be 20 minutes early?
Would you rather be able to read minds or control minds?
Would you rather have dinner with your favorite celebrity or with your best friend?
Would you rather live without the internet or without air conditioning?
Would you rather be able to talk to animals or speak all human languages?
Would you rather live in a world without music or without books?
Would you rather be feared by all but loved by none or loved by all but feared by none?
Would you rather have a rewind button in life or a pause button?
Would you rather explore space or the deep sea?
Would you rather fight 100 duck-sized horses or 1 horse-sized duck?
Would you rather be rich and miserable or poor and happy?
Would you rather live forever or have the power to resurrect someone once?
Would you rather always know the truth or always be lied to?
Would you rather be able to play every musical instrument or be able to speak every language?
Would you rather be the smartest person in the world or the richest?
Would you rather be able to breathe underwater or be able to walk through fire?
Would you rather live on a beach or in the mountains?
Would you rather never have to sleep or never have to eat?
Would you rather be able to teleport anywhere or be able to read minds?
Would you rather know when you're going to die or how you're going to die?
Would you rather have the ability to talk to your past self or to your future self?
Would you rather always have to tell the truth or always have to lie?
Would you rather live in a place with no seasons or in a place where it’s always raining?
Would you rather have a rewind button in your life or a fast-forward button?
Would you rather be able to control time or control people's actions?
Would you rather never age or never feel pain?
Would you rather live in a world where money doesn’t exist or a world without crime?
Would you rather lose your ability to speak or your ability to hear?
Would you rather live in a futuristic city or a small village?
Would you rather never use social media again or never watch TV again?
Would you rather always be stuck in traffic or always have to wait in long lines?
Would you rather have no internet for a week or no phone for a week?
Would you rather live in a mansion with no friends or in a small house with all your friends?
